text: to kya ye log rooe zameen par chale phire nahin, to dekhate ki jo log inase pahale the unaka kya anjaam hua, jo unase (taadaad mein) kaheen jyaada the aur qoovat aur zameen par (apanee) nishaaniyaan (yaadagaaren) chhodane mein bhee kaheen badh chadh kar the to jo kuchh un logon ne kiya karaaya tha unake kuchh bhee kaam na aaya
